column2: dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal / sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma / rgyags byed ma / zla ba'i dpal / nyi ma'i dpal; gza' thams cad kyi dpal / sengge la zhon ma / padma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma / padma / padma las byung ma / padma la gnas ma / padma 'dzin ma / padma dang ldan ma / rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba du ma dang ldan ma / nor sbyin ma / dkar mo / dkar mo chen mo / lag dkar ma / bkra shis thams cad 'dzin ma /

column1: sarva maFgala DAriNI sarva puNya upacita aFgI dAkzAyaNI Sata sahasra BujA Sata sahasra nayanA Sata sahasraSirAH Smdv viviDa vicitra maNi mOliDarA surUpA viSva rUpA yaSA mahA yaSA sOmyA bahu jImUtA pavitra keSA candrakAntA sUryakAntA SuBA SuBa kartrI sarva sattva aBimuKI AryA kusuma SrIH kusumeSvarA
column2: bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i @107b lus can ma / shes nyin gyi bu mo / lag pa 'bum ldan ma / mig 'bum ldan ma / mgo 'bum ldan ma / nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma / gzugs bzang ma / kun gyi gzugs can ma / grags ma / shin tu grags ma / zhi ma / sprin 'dra ba'i skra gtsang ma / zla ba ltar mdzes ma / dge ma / dge byed ma / sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal / 'phags pa me tog gi dpal / me tog gi dbang phyug ma /

column1: sarva sumeru parvata rAja SrIH sarva nadI sarIt SrIH sarva toya samudra SrIH sarva tIrTa aBimuKa SrIH
column2: ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal / chu klung dang / mtsho thams cad kyi dpal / chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal / mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal /

column1: sarva ozaDi tRNa vanaspati Dana DAnya SrIH hiraNya dA anna pAnadA praBA svarA Aloka karA pavitra aFgA sarva taTAgata vaSa vartinI sarva deva gaNa muKa SrIH yama varuNA kubera vAsava SrIH dAtrI BoktrI tejA tejovatI viBUtIH samRdDiH vivRdDiH unnatiH Darma SrIH mADava ASrayA kusuma nilayA anasUyA puruzakAra ASrayA sarva pavitra gAtrA maFgala hastA sarva alakzmI nASayitrI
column2: sman dang / rtsva dang / nags tshal dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal / gser sbyin ma / zas dang / skom spyin ma / 'od gsal ma / snang ma / lus gtsang ma / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma / lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal / sbyin byed ma / longs spyod ma / gzi brjid ma / gzi brjid ldan ma / phun sum tshogs ma / 'byor pa ma / rnam par 'phel ma / mthong ma / chos kyi dpal ma / khyab 'jug la brten ma / ku mu da la gnas ma / gnod sbyin ma / bzod sbyin ma / mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma / dag byed dang bkra shis @108a *// thams cad kyi lag ldan ma / bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig byed ma / bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal /

column1: sarva puNya AkarzaNa SrIH sarva pRTivI SrIH sarva rAja SrIH sarva vidyADara rAja SrIH sarva BUta yakza rAkzasa preta piSAca kuMBANxa mahA uraga SrIH
column2: sa thams cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal / lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal / bzlas brjod dang bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal / 'od ldan ma / mchog dga' ma / skal pas 'gyur ma / drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal / bud med thams cad kyi gnas /

column1: dyutiH pramoda BAgya lolA sarva Rzi pavitra SrIH sarva SrIH Bava jyezWa uttama SrIH sarva kinnara sarva sUrya uttama SrIH niravadya sTAna vAsinI rUpavatI suKa karI kubera kAntAH DarmarAja SrIH
column2: kun gyi gtso mo dpal gyi mchog / mi'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma / yid 'ong ma sim byed ma / lus ngan la sdug ma / chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal /

column1: om vilokaya tAraya mocaya mama sarva duHKeByaH sarva puNya samBArAnAmuKIkuru svAhA
column2: aom sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig / thar bar mdzod cig / bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur bar mdzod cig sv'a h'a /

column1: om gaFgA Adi sarva tIrTa ani AmuiKIkuru svAhA om sAvitryE svAhA
column2: aom gangg'a sarba tirtha mu khe sv'a h'a / aom sarba bi tre sv'a h'a / sarba mam ga la dh'a ra ni sv'a h'a / tsa tu re be da sarba naksha @108b tra; g'a h'a ga / n'a h'a ga /

column1: sarva maFgala DAriNyE Smdv  svAhA catur veda nakzatra graha gaNa Adi mUrtyE svAhA
column2: n'a dh'a m'urta ye sv'a h'a /

column1: brahmaNe svAhA vizNave svAhA rudrAya svAhA viSva muKAya svAhA
column2: brahm'a ya sv'a h'a / bishnu ye sv'a h'a / ru dr'a ya sv'a h'a / bi shva mu kh'a ya sv'a h'a /

column1: om nigrigrini sarva kArya sADani sini sini AvAhayAmi devi SrI vESravaNAya svAhA suvarNa Dana DAnya AkarzaNyE svAhA
column2: aom gri ni gri na sarba k'arya s'a dha ni / si ni si ni / a'a b'a h'a / de ba h'a / bee shra ma n'a ya sv'a h'a / su barna / dha na dhya n+ya / a'a karsha n+yee sv'a h'a / sarba pu n+yee sv'a h'a / shr'i he ba te a'a karsha n+yee sv'a h'a /

column1: sarva puNya AkarzaNyE svAhA SrI devatA AkarzaNyE svAhA sarva pApanASanyE svAhA sarva alakzmI praSamanyE svAhA
column2: sarba p'a pam na sha myee sv'a h'a / sarba aa lakshmi pra sha ma n+yee sv'a h'a /

column1: sarva taTAgata aBiziktAyE svAhA
column2: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ye sv'a h'a / sarba de ba ta aa bhi mu kha shri ye aa yur ba la parna ke ra ye sv'a h'a / sarba ba ti tva mam ga la ha sta ya sv'a h'a / sim ga ba ha na ne sv'a h'a /

column1: sarva devatA aBimuKa Sriye svAhA AyuH bala varNa karAyE svAhA
column2: padma sam bhu ta ye sv'a h'a /

column1: sarva pavitra maFgala hastAyE svAhA siMha vAhinyE svAhA padmasaMBUtAyE svAhA sarva kRtyakA KoH davinA aSanyE svAhA imAni tAni aBayA avalokita ISvara SriyA mahAdevyA nAmAni sarva kilviza nASanAni sarva pApa viDvaMsana karANi sarva puNya AkarzaNa karANi sarva alakzmI praSamana karANi sarva SrI sOBAgya AkarzaNa karANi
column2: sarba kra ti ka khorda bi n'a sha ne sv'a h'a / 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa / sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa / bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa / bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa /

column1: yaH kaScid vArayizyati imAni taTAgata nAmAni kalyam utTAya SucinA sarva budDAnAm puzpa DUpam dattvA SriyE mahAdevyE candana DUpam dattvA vAcayitavyAni sarva Sriyam aDigamizyati
column2: dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal pa bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang par byas la sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsandan gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na / des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //

column1: sarva suKa sOmanasI alABI Bavizyati sarva devatAH ca rakzA AvaraNa guptim karizyanti
column2: bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur / lha thams @109a *// cad kyang srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur //

column1: sarva kArya sidDiH tasya Bavizyati idam avocat BagavAn Atta manAH aBayA avalokita ISvaraH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
column2: de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
